016package app.supernaut.fx.micronaut;
017
018import app.supernaut.fx.FxmlLoaderFactory;
019import app.supernaut.fx.services.FxBrowserService;
020import app.supernaut.fx.test.NoopBackgroundApp;
021import io.micronaut.context.ApplicationContext;
022import io.micronaut.context.BeanContext;
023import io.micronaut.context.env.Environment;
024import javafx.application.Application;
025import javafx.application.HostServices;
026import app.supernaut.BackgroundApp;
027import app.supernaut.services.BrowserService;
028import app.supernaut.fx.FxForegroundApp;
029import app.supernaut.fx.FxLauncherAbstract;
030import org.slf4j.Logger;
031import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
032
033/**
034 * A launcher that uses http://micronaut.io to instantiate the foreground and background applications.
035 */
036public class MicronautFxLauncher extends FxLauncherAbstract {
037    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(FxLauncherAbstract.class);
038
039    /**
040     * Default constructor that initializes the background app on its own thread.
041     */
042    public MicronautFxLauncher() {
043        this(true);
044    }
045
046    /**
047     *
048     * @param initializeBackgroundAppOnNewThread If true, initializes {@code appFactorySupplier} and
049     *        {@code BackgroundApp} on new thread, if false start them on calling thread (typically the main thread)
050     */
051    public MicronautFxLauncher(boolean initializeBackgroundAppOnNewThread) {
052        super(() -> new MicronautAppFactory(false), initializeBackgroundAppOnNewThread);
053    }
054
055    /**
056     *
057     * @param initializeBackgroundAppOnNewThread If true, initializes {@code appFactorySupplier} and
058     *        {@code BackgroundApp} on new thread, if false start them on calling thread (typically the main thread)
059     * @param useApplicationContext If {@code true} creates and uses an {@link ApplicationContext},
060     *                             if {@code false} creates and uses a {@link BeanContext}
061     */
062    public MicronautFxLauncher(boolean initializeBackgroundAppOnNewThread,
063                               boolean useApplicationContext) {
064        super(() -> new MicronautAppFactory(useApplicationContext), initializeBackgroundAppOnNewThread);
065    }
066
067    /**
068     * {@inheritDoc}
069     */
070    @Override
071    public String name() {
072        return "micronaut";
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Implement of AppFactory using either a Micronaut {@link BeanContext} or {@link ApplicationContext}
077     */
078    public static class MicronautAppFactory implements AppFactory {
079        private final BeanContext context;
080
081        /**
082         * Constructor for Micronaut implementation of AppFactory
083         * @param useApplicationContext create {@link ApplicationContext} if true, {@link BeanContext} if false
084         */
085        public MicronautAppFactory(boolean useApplicationContext) {
086            if (useApplicationContext) {
087                log.info("Creating Micronaut ApplicationContext");
088                this.context = ApplicationContext.builder(Environment.CLI).build();
089            } else {
090                log.info("Creating Micronaut BeanContext");
091                this.context = BeanContext.build();
092            }
093
094            log.info("Starting context");
095            context.start();
096        }
097
098        /**
099         * {@inheritDoc}
100         */
101        @Override
102        public BackgroundApp createBackgroundApp(Class<? extends BackgroundApp> backgroundAppClass) {
103            if (backgroundAppClass.equals(NoopBackgroundApp.class)) {
104                // Special case for NoopBackgroundApp which is not an (annotated) Micronaut Bean
105                return new NoopBackgroundApp();
106            } else {
107                return context.getBean(backgroundAppClass);
108            }
109        }
110
111        /**
112         * {@inheritDoc}
113         */
114        @Override
115        public FxForegroundApp createForegroundApp(Class<? extends FxForegroundApp> foregroundAppClass, Application proxyApplication) {
116            return getForegroundAppBean(foregroundAppClass, proxyApplication);
117        }
118
119        /**
120         * Subclass {@link MicronautAppFactory} and override this method to customize your {@link BeanContext}.
121         *
122         * @param clazz The FXForegroundApp sub-class that we are creating and injecting
123         * @param proxyApplication The proxy implementation instance of {@link Application}
124         * @return A newly constructed and injected {@link FxForegroundApp} instance
125         */
126        protected FxForegroundApp getForegroundAppBean(Class<? extends FxForegroundApp> clazz, Application proxyApplication) {
127            log.info("getForegroundAppBean()");
128            // Since FXForegroundApp doesn't extend Application, an app that needs access to the
129            // Application object can have it injected.
130            context.registerSingleton(Application.class, proxyApplication);
131
132            // An app that needs HostServices can have it injected. For opening URLs in browsers
133            // the BrowserService interface is preferred.
134            context.registerSingleton(HostServices.class, proxyApplication.getHostServices());
135            context.registerSingleton(BrowserService.class, new FxBrowserService(proxyApplication.getHostServices()));
136
137            context.registerSingleton(FxmlLoaderFactory.class, new MicronautFxmlLoaderFactory(context));
138            return context.getBean(clazz);
139        }
140    }
141}
